title: Deathcamp Project - Well-Known Pleasures (2008) [mp3@VBR]
description:
Genre: Gothic / Electro / Industrial / Deathrock
Origin: Poland, Kluczbork
Release: October 13th, 2008 
Total playing time 44:23 

Track list
1   Another (3:34) 
2   Rule And Control (5:21) 
3   Mirrors Of Pain (4:13) 
4   Away From You (3:15) 
5   Behind (4:27) 
6   Fuckin' Deathrock (3:14) 
7   Divine Words (2:50) 
8   Circle Of Silence (5:53) 
9   Dead Hours (5:22) 
10   New Dawn Fades (Joy Division Cover) (7:30) 


Current line-up 
Mr. Void Ladykiller - Vocals, guitar (Messalian)
Mr. Betrayal Wifehunter - Bass, keyboards, programming (Messalian)
Mr. Karol - Session Guitar 


A great mixture of gothic rock, deathrock, electro & industrial.
The band was born in Kluczbork (Poland) in 2001.

Deathcamp Project is a Polish band that was established in 2001. It consists of Betrayal who is responsible for bass, programming and keyboards and Void who looks after lyrics, guitars and vocals. They are said to create goth rock music with the elements of death rock, electronics and industrial. 

During the last 6 years have created their own, intriguing mixture of sounds taking their inspiration from goth-rock
of The Sisters of Mercy, Joy Division, The Cure and Fields of the Nephilim, deathrock of Christian Death, electro sound of Clan of Xymox as well as murderous sound of a drum machine (a nod towards industrial group Laibach).The combination works well with a polished, dark image the band presents on stage.
